rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with a central chandelier and Vastu compliant layout

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room for social dining; placed in the southeast for prosperity

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a balcony extending towards the east for morning sunlight and Vastu alignment

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with its own balcony on the west side for privacy and ventilation

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Well-lit bedroom including a balcony ensuring natural light and Vastu principles

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another balanced bedroom with a balcony for cross ventilation and aesthetic view

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen placed in the northeast region to ensure positive energy flow according to Vastu

rooms.name: Dining Corridor
rooms.description: Corridor connecting dining area and living room; designed with ample space for passage

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Additional family space located near the living room, optimized for relaxation
